questions.title: 你觉得我的第一本小说怎么样啊？
questions.answer: How do you like my first novel?

questions.title: 你觉得云南西双版纳的自然风景怎么样啊？
questions.answer: How do you like the natural scenery in Xishuangbanna in Yunnan?

questions.title: 这块新鲜的牛排是为你的到来而买的，你打算怎么享用？
questions.answer: This piece of fresh steak is for your coming, how do you like it?

questions.title: 你已经住这有一段时间了，你觉得这里的住宿环境怎么样啊？
questions.answer: You have been here for some time, how do you like the accommodationenvironment here?

questions.title: 你觉得我儿子画的这两幅画怎么样啊？
questions.answer: How do you like these two pictures which were drawn by my son?

title: ——你觉得星巴克的咖啡怎么样？
——顺滑、浓郁、香甜可口。

answer.en: How do you like the coffee in Starbucks?
How do you like your steak cooked?
How do you like your college entrance examination?
Just so-so. I dare not think.
How do you like the food in China?
It's pretty good. I just can't get used to using chopsticks.
